website_summaries.verdict: Uses only the most natural ingredients available, plus healthy probiotics for extended digestive tract health. The price is also hard to beat.
pros: Exceptionally gentle on the digestive system, very few stomach issues reported
Will not interfere with other medication regimens, such as thyroid or diabetic meds
Improved energy and weight loss are common side effects
cons: Very few critical reviews from customers, but we still recommend standard colon cleanse precautions: drink plenty of water, be prepared for digestive emergencies, and seek treatment for any allergic reactions to ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Almost works too well!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to get through all 15 days, it works that well! Definitely does the "job", but it was difficult having to urgently run to the bathroom when I had places to be in the morning. I had mild cramps, but only because I didn't drink enough water. Taking only one pill was effective for a few days, then I had to bump it up to two because it wasn't producing a bowel movement like it had the first few days. Cleans you out that's for sure, just make sure you drink enough water.
customer_reviews.author: Robetta

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having severe constipation due to medication....at times I couldn’t even remember when I passed stool last. Recently the constipation got worse and very uncomfortable. So I did research on colon cleanses and with this one getting rave reviews I decided to try it. I took 2 pills the first two nights and like the instructions said In a 24 hour period I’ve had 4 stools and I already feel better! I do have mild stomach cramping and bubbling right before I have to go but it’s nothing unbearable. I was starting to get concerned that I had a more serious condition going on but thanks to this product I finally feel relief! This product works!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to loose weight so a friend recommended that I try this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating fast food for basically my whole life. I wanted to loose weight so a friend recommended that I try this product. Not only have I been loosing weight, I feel totally detoxified. I had no idea what was stuck up in my guts till I started working it all out. I feel lighter and healthier, even my mood is better. So yes, two thumbs up if you want get purified.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lape

customer_reviews.title: Yowza!!
customer_reviews.text: Yowza! These things work!!! The first time you take them be prepared to be in the bathroom a LOT. Drink a LOT of water with them. That’s important. I took them for 9 days straight. The first 3-4 days were intense then got better. Now I use these for 3 days every few weeks for maintenance. Maintence is by far easier than the first 8-10 days so BE PATIENT.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T

customer_reviews.title: Not the best nor the worst i have tried
customer_reviews.text: Made me feel like i was going to die, stomach cramped up bad and then nothing happened.... not for me .
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Oh the pain.
customer_reviews.text: They work in the sense they clean your colon, however they say to take them at night and there is absolutely nothing fun about waking up in pain from stomach cramps.
customer_reviews.author: ShaShauna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described! Watch the video first!
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely does what it says it does! I would not start with two, like the video says. It’s way too much! After a few days taking just one at night, I can do two now. No side effects, nothing negative to report.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff will give you the runs for your money
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to wake my male friend by flushing the toilet all night as this stuff makes you poop often. So I went outside and found a white flower pot and went in it. The second trip it was cold outside so I put on my sweater and proceeded to the Flower pot once again. In the morning he asked how this stuff worked. Upon telling him the story we couldn’t contain ourselves from laughing until the tears ran down our cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Removes instestines as well
customer_reviews.text: So the headline title is over indulged words, but I stopped taking this cleanse because it made me feel as though I had a virus and couldn't leave the restroom. I found other cleanses less harsh and I will go back to those the next time. It works, but I would suggest doing it over a weekend and save yourself embarrassment at your place of work.
customer_reviews.author: Yes i tried it

customer_reviews.title: This will do a good job cleaning out that thanks giving meal the very ...
customer_reviews.text: This will do a good job cleaning out that thanks giving meal the very next day without residual incidents. I use it once per weekend, once per month as a general maintenance.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and works as expected. Just don't take it before bed or you will wake with awful cramps.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Your stomach will hurt for a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Anytime i eat too much or feel sluggish due to overeating in the past few days i take 2 of these around 8pm by 2pm the next day i poop EVERYTHING OUT. Amazing product. Your stomach will hurt for a little in the morning then again a few hours later and then youll poop a LOT. But trust me. The act of pooping = Life. Great product will continue to buy for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and super effective. The Key is HYDRATE
customer_reviews.text: Super simple and super effective, I'm super happy and recommending it to everybody. The key is HYDRATE, HYRATE, HYDRATE. ... Did I say HYDRATE? Hydration. I did it three bottles of colon cleanse consecutively to get good flow and a shift, and I'll do it again in three months. Thank you! I just ordered again. I do best drinking water daily at regular intervals- hourly. Plus I take water before bed (little or I wake to pee) and water as soon as I wake up. Magic! If I don't drink water, I find my "tummy" is more sensitive to cleansing and I get 'stopped up'. It's why I train myself to hydrate all day long.

customer_reviews.title: Honest 15 day review!
customer_reviews.text: When Looking for a product, I look through the reviews/read the product info. and then decide to purchase or continue looking. I purchased this product based on the reviews and this really the only cleanse with five stars and great reviews. What I am going to do for future posters, is a one day post, a seven day post and a 15 day post. The information on this product is based on super strength cleanse and colon detox plus weight loss. I just received the product today and will start on Monday. I will start with five stars because I received the correct product and it was fast shipment, as I go through my days, I will adjust accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works
customer_reviews.text: These do the job! However, please PLEASE be careful when taking. Do your research! It does say on the bottle to take PERIODICALLY, which I was taking every day. It eventually ended up giving me stomach pains. I certainly lost weight which wasn't the goal but at least I know the product is working. Take them every other day or so. It wont hurt your stomach but will still work. Also, be aware you will use the restroom frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customet
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review (2019). I have ordered and tried multiple multiple times this product. Previously I rated them with a 3 star because I was doing the "15 day detox," and I wasn't comfortable with that because it caused me discomfort; 15 detox days for me is a bit too much. ...but now, I only take the pills when I get constipated or feel too bloated and that seems to work too good for me.. So I will up my rating to a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Oops.e.Daisy

customer_reviews.title: but fortunately I kept using it for four or five treatments ...
customer_reviews.text: It is appearing that 15 Day Cleanse is eliminating a severe case of constipation and hemorrhoids, but fortunately I kept using it for four or five treatments at 1 tablet/day. I almost gave up on the product because at first it appeared to be doing nothing, but, at this time, I am thinking that the severe constipation and hemorrhoids are either totally eliminated or almost totally eliminated. I hope to have a CT scan soon to see the progress. I would highly recommend that you all advise that multiple treatments are required for severe cases of constipation and hemorrhoids: there are probably many who need to know this.
customer_reviews.author: Odysseus

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and didn't give me the trots. Plenty of warning. Would have given it a 5 but I think there should be more tablets. For a hard system I sometimes had to double the dose. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunda Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Got things "moving along"
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. No bad side effects and got things "moving along" as they should. Combined with making better diet choices, I am already down 4 lbs in 1 week. Very happy with product and highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: didn't do much - not weight loss
customer_reviews.text: i was trying to lose a little water weight/ waste weight and decided to try these. there was minor cramping when i took 2 pills each time but nothing unbearable. would not buy again

customer_reviews.text: This cleanse initially aided my weight loss program and I still use it as maintenance. What I like best is there is no cramping and it really does get rid of any bloating.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, it help me to stay less bloated and loose a little weight for my daughter wedding so I can fit into the dress .

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two tablets at night equals diarrhea in the morning for this sensitive tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. E

customer_reviews.title: wowsers - this was flushing stuff out efficiently!
customer_reviews.text: This will seriously flush your system... as long as you are drinking plenty of water (ie a gallon each day... it was sucking moisture like crazy!). It was so effective that I saw gum (accidentally swallowed) within about 12 hours of swallowing... Sometimes I'm not sure if the total flush was 100% necessary; however, it was quite effective at pushing stuff through my system rather rapidly. And it emptied out any feeling of colon build-up. Just a note: it is effective throughout the day. You might want to be around a toilet and not go on too many long car rides through rural areas. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: H'Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Better products put there.
customer_reviews.text: This product will make you go, but "results" are not well formed. I have had better results with other, simular products.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: My tummy is definitely flatter. For me, the products works a bit too well. A couple of hours after a meal I have to run to the loo. I do mean run. It reminds me of laxatives, but without the debilitating nausea. Not sure what it will be like after the cleanse, but I expect the bloat to come back.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I recommend to start with one capsules. I am glad I tested one, because I had a mild diarrhea from it. What helps if you take it with fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: and works well not like others that have you running to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Does as stated, and works well not like others that have you running to the bathroom. This one works normally, but has you going more often than accustomed. 1-3 times a day to 3-6 a day
customer_reviews.author: ROMEO

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to do one because of feeling like there was a brick in my stomach everyday
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a cleanse before so I was very nervous. I wanted to do one because of feeling like there was a brick in my stomach everyday, not for weight loss purposes. I did not lose any weight, but the pain in my stomach has been gone for 2 plus weeks. Maybe it is a mind thing, I don't know, but I feel like it reset me which is exactly what I was hoping for. Things I didn't know about participating in a cleanse is that it is essentially giving yourself IBS for two weeks and the greasier food you eat the worse it is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Alba

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cleanses and I noticed a decrease in bloating. I like the all natural ingredients. I didn't have any weight loss or extra energy and I was pretty careful watching that I ate healthy. I bought this to cleanse before detox my liver with Milk Thistle. I am off to a good start.

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with me!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken 2, just 2 pills. 1 and one again a few days later.. gave me explosive diarrhea. The emergency kind of poop, for days..I'm throwing them out. I must have had an allergic reaction to an ingredient. UPDATE: Without asking the company refunded my money! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to jumpstart a healthier eating plan. It works very well. Made me feel like my body was clearing out the gunk and getting clean. I was ready to be camped out by the bathroom, but no need! It was very gentle and comfortable. I will rely on this to use periodically when I need a boost!

customer_reviews.title: Improved energy, mood, weight!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, great, great, worked for me from day one. moves things along without horrible cramps, you'll feel things moving down the line, but nothing uncomfortable. Energy up! Mood up! Weight down! Just Excellent, if you want to clean out your system and feel better, this is it.

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for me..
customer_reviews.text: If you take it before bedtime, be prepared for some fireworks in the morning..

customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first 2 doses - after that it seemed like I was ingesting placebos!

product_meta.title: 15 Day Colon Cleanser Detox with Extra Strength Herbs and Probiotics, Senna is a Fast Acting Natural Laxative for Constipation Relief - Whole Body Cleanse - 30 Capsules
feature_bullets: DETOX FAST WITH OUR BEST SELLER! - Relieve bloating & constipation for healthier digestion with energy boosting herbs found in Eternal Zen's 15 Day Cleanse

MANUFACTURED IN THE USA - We manufacture our non-GMO supplements in a certified facility following the strictest industry standards. The number one most important thing when you buy is that you are happy, if not we will give you your money back, no questions asked.
SENNA & CASCARA SAGRADA - herbal laxatives to help provide instant relief to your digestive system
PSYLLIUM HUSK & FLAX SEED POWDER - soluble fiber and omega 3 fatty acids to help remove waste from the walls of your intestines

LICORICE ROOT & ALOE VERA & LACTOBACILLUS ACIDOPHILUS - help coat the inner lining of the gut and reinoculate it with healthy bacteria. Start with just one pill before bed for the first four days. Some people do not need to take two to get the result they desire.
